"I've been following Philia's words. Been practicing Techniques too."
"However, the rod I've been issued... feels a bit unwieldy and quite difficult to use. I think the term would be \"unfitting\"?"
"...fufufu, Though I haven't tried anything else. If I get picky, Philia might get angry again."
"Despite that, going through the motion and getting better... It's kind of fun."
"...I don't think I'm ready to go into battle anytime soon, though."
"Hey, it's not like I've been fantasizing about me fighting to protect you or anything..."
"B-but, if I work hard enough, and be able to carry myself like you do..."
"When that time comes, I'll support <%me> with all I have."
